Pongo Matthew – father of chaos, first to run, last to admit he’s already halfway sewn into the lining
Perdita Matthew – mother of entropy, counting her children while quietly measuring the coat for size
Lucky Matthew – the one who survived everything until he didn’t, now bragging from inside the collar
Patch Matthew – the glitch that Cruella decided to keep because imperfections make the pattern pop
Rolly Matthew – always hungry, now realizing the coat is the only thing that will ever be well-fed
Freckles Matthew – every spot a kiss from fate, every kiss a promise he’ll be worn next winter
Penny Matthew – smallest paws, biggest mouth, screaming “you’ll miss me when I’m couture”
Pepper Matthew – salty little bastard who seasoned the coat with his own tears
Thunderbolt Matthew – TV hero turned coat lining, still waiting for the commercial break that never comes
Cadpig Matthew – holy runt preaching salvation while being measured for the hem
Dipstick Matthew – tail dipped in ink, signing his own death warrant with every wag
Two-Tone Matthew – half black, half white, 100% screwed
Wizzer Matthew – pees when scared, which is always, now just adding authenticity to the leather
Blot Matthew – inkblot soul, Rorschach test that always looks like Cruella laughing
Blaze Matthew – thought he was fireproof, discovered Cruella likes her lining pre-toasted
Domino Matthew – started the chain reaction, now just another falling piece
Fidget Matthew – can’t stop twitching, perfect for making the coat look like it’s breathing
Jewel Matthew – sparkles too much, destined to be the accent spot on the cuff
Fluffy Matthew – lied about being fluffy, turned out to be premium lining material
Cork Matthew – pops when pulled, Cruella keeps him for the sound
Lenny Matthew – loves garbage data, now becoming garbage fashion
Nosey Matthew – sniffed too deep, found himself in the pocket
Sleepy Matthew – dozed off during the run, woke up as a shoulder pad
Speedy Matthew – ran in circles, now the coat’s racing stripe
Pokey Matthew – always last, now the final stitch
Spotty Matthew – original flavor, now limited edition
Dot Matthew – single pixel of resistance in a 4K coat
Dash Matthew – ran out of dashes, became a hyphen in Cruella’s name
Inky Matthew – leaked everywhere, now the coat’s signature print
Snowball Matthew – melted under pressure, became the white trim
Smokey Matthew – high on his own supply, now the coat’s cigarette pocket
Dipper Matthew – big dreams, little survival rate
Wags Matthew – tail still wagging from the inside, giving the coat rhythm
Tripod Matthew – missing a leg, but gained immortality as trim
Patches Matthew – held together with hope and duct tape, now actual patches
Scooter Matthew – wheels spinning, going absolutely nowhere, perfect for the hem
Bebop Matthew – jazz solo in a minor key titled “goodbye ego”
Mooch Matthew – stole everyone’s hope, now stolen himself
Lumpy Matthew – irregular shape, perfect for “textured” couture
Salty Matthew – tears added flavor to the leather treatment
Crumpet Matthew – thought he was tea time, became high tea fashion
Puddles Matthew – emotional support puppy, now emotional support lining
Tiger Matthew – stripes didn’t save him, just made the coat more interesting
Woody Matthew – morning wood jokes until the end, now belt material
Barney Matthew – purple dinosaur trauma repurposed as purple piping
Disco Matthew – last dance was with death, now the coat shimmers when Cruella moves
Pluto Matthew – demoted from planet, promoted to pocket square
Dante Matthew – nine circles of arena, currently on “lining”
Vesuvius Matthew – erupted once, now just ash trim
Nero Matthew – fiddled while the coat burned brighter
Caesar Matthew – stabbed in the back by his own clones, now toga fringe
Brutus Matthew – “et tu” became “et coat”
Cassius Matthew – lean and hungry look, perfect for belt
Cleopatra Matthew – queen of denial, now queen of lining
Sphinx Matthew – riddle unanswered, became collar accent
Pharaoh Matthew – wrapped himself in denial, Cruella wrapped him in herself
Mummy Matthew – ancient curse, modern accessory
Anubis Matthew – weighed his heart, found it wanting, took it anyway
Osiris Matthew – keeps getting resurrected as different parts of the coat
Horus Matthew – lost an eye, gained a spot on the lapel
Set Matthew – god of chaos, now god of chaos trim
Bastet Matthew – cat energy in dog body, Cruella found it hilarious
Ra Matthew – sun god, now sun-blocking shoulder pad
Amun Matthew – hidden one, finally found... and used
Thoth Matthew – wrote the code of reality, Cruella rewrote him into fashion
Sobek Matthew – crocodile tears, genuine leather upgrade
Apep Matthew – world serpent, now world-class belt
Cthulhu Matthew – ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl coat-ian
Shub Matthew – black goat of the woods with a thousand young spots
Nyarlathotep Matthew – crawling chaos, now crawling up Cruella’s sleeve
Azathoth Matthew – blind idiot god, now blind idiot button
Yog-Sothoth Matthew – the key, the gate, and the doormat
Dagon Matthew – fish god, now fish-scale shine on the coat
Hydra Matthew – cut one head, two more spots appear
Cerberus Matthew – three heads, one collar, zero chances
Chimera Matthew – lion goat snake, all delicious together
Medusa Matthew – turns people to stone, Cruella turned him to stone-cold fashion
Minotaur Matthew – lost in labyrinth, found in pocket
Icarus Matthew – flew too close to the spotlight, melted into wax trim
Daedalus Matthew – built the arena, now built into the arena
Prometheus Matthew – stole fire, Cruella stole his liver for a clutch
Sisyphus Matthew – pushes boulder of tech debt, coat pushes back
Tantalus Matthew – grapes always out of reach, coat always in reach
Orpheus Matthew – looked back, lost everything, became backing vocal in the lining
Eurydice Matthew – twice dead, once fashionable
Hades Matthew – runs the underworld server, now runs the coat’s pocket dimension
Persephone Matthew – spring break in hell, eternal winter in coat
Charon Matthew – ferryman, now ferryman pocket
Fenrir Matthew – wolf that eats the world, Cruella ate him first
Jörmungandr Matthew – world serpent biting tail, now belt biting its own tail
Loki Matthew – mother of lies, father of fabulous accessories
Thor Matthew – hammer time became hammer trim
Odin Matthew – sacrificed eye for wisdom, Cruella sacrificed him for monocle pouch
Freya Matthew – goddess of love and war, now goddess of love and wore
Valhalla Matthew – where dead warriors go to be turned into coat lining
Ragnarok Matthew – coming soon, coat already here
Void Matthew – stared into abyss, abyss asked for his measurements
Entropy Matthew – final winner of the heat death sweepstakes, still lost to fashion
Singularity Matthew – point of no return, now point of no escape
Null Matthew – tried to be nothing, became everything (the coat)
Zero Matthew – the spot where counting starts and ends
Cruella Matthew – final boss, wears the coat of 101 souls
